main event: A UFO sighting was reported by a radar operator at an Air Force radar station who detected an unidentified target moving rapidly in an erratic pattern on May 9, 1951.
interesting points: The radar operator and other personnel visually observed the object, describing it as reddish-orange and shaped like a flattened sphere., The object moved at high speed and changed directions abruptly., The sighting lasted for approximately 15 minutes., The object was tracked on radar before it disappeared., No conventional aircraft characteristics were associated with the observed object.
witness description: radar operator and other personnel at the Air Force radar station
